question: Which island region is geographically related to Cape Verde?
explanation: Cape Verde is one of the four archipelagos of Macaronesia in the North Atlantic Ocean. Macaronesia is a collection of four archipelagos in the North Atlantic Ocean such as Azores, Madeira, Canary, Cape Verde. These islands belong to three countries such as Portugal, Spain and Cape Verde. These archipelagos are formed by seamount islands on the ocean floor.
